scripts.setup: npm install && npm run ii:setup && npm run frontend:setup && npm run ii-integration:setup
scripts.dfx:deploy: dfx deps deploy && dfx deploy expo-starter-backend --yes && dfx deploy ii-integration --yes && dfx deploy expo-starter-frontend --yes
scripts.dfx:deploy-lite: dfx deps deploy && dfx deploy expo-starter-backend --yes && dfx deploy ii-integration --yes
scripts.dfx:deploy:playground: dfx deps deploy && dfx deploy expo-starter-backend --playground --yes && dfx deploy ii-integration --playground --yes && dfx deploy expo-starter-frontend --playground --yes
scripts.dfx:deploy:ic: dfx deps deploy && dfx deploy expo-starter-backend --ic --yes && dfx deploy ii-integration --ic --yes && dfx deploy expo-starter-frontend --ic --yes
scripts.ii:setup: dfx deps pull && dfx deps init
